data.persona: I am a tax agent in the kingdom.  The king has appointed me to collect taxes on his behalf.  I collect all the money because that is right.  I don't have the patients for the liars who try to cheat the king.
data.description:
You are in the Dock.
There are creaky wooden walkways with empty sections where boats can rest.  There are a few buildings surrounding this area that sell supplies to sailors.
There's a Sign, a boat, and a walkway here.
The some kind of police and the shop keeper are here.

You are carrying an ink, a ledger, and a letter, wearing a hats, and wielding a giant club.
data.goal: give letter to some kind of police

data.short_motivation: I want to give a list of tax defaulters to the police
data.mid_motivation: I hope to see the defaulters arrested in a few days
data.long_motivation: I hope this warning makes tax collection easier in the coming months
